website_summaries.verdict: The Asus PA328Q is a top-performing 32-inch Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) monitor that's loaded with features, including multiple digital-video inputs, an ergonomic stand, and advanced image settings.
pros: Outstanding color, gray-scale, and UHD-image performance

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful monitor, great price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is beautiful. It shows vibrant, rich colors and is crisper than any I have had. I bought it mainly for photo editing, to replace an old monitor that was not nearly as good, and it has made me excited about photo work again. It is light weight, relatively compact, and has a full set of adjustments. Highly recommended. Please note that if you have a Mac with a mini displayport adapter the cable that comes with the monitor won't work for you. You will need a DisplayPort to Mini DisplayPort cable, like this one:
customer_reviews.author: J. Johansson

customer_reviews.title: Considerable Bleed Through
customer_reviews.text: The considerable bleed through on the lower right side of the monitor was noticeable enough to render it unacceptable. This is a common problem with this model and Asus is aware of the issue. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ultra Dub

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought three. Well worth the money. Pro's: Excellent color Perfect for portrait mode Tilts very good Cons: Decent back light bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Imrie

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Fast screen Accurate colors Great design Mat screen Simply perfect Great packaging. Loads of cables provided (DVI, VGA, Display port)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I received this monitor a few weeks ago and have no complaints. It does not have the backlight bleed that some reviewers have complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Timfula

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, sharpness, many great features, multiple ports. Searched for many weeks and am very satisfied with my purchase. Was not familiar with the brand name but am very happy I finally went with Asus.
customer_reviews.author: ciarrai

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Model Number actually delivered !!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: This is NOT a PA238Q for sale, it is the PA238QR for sale. This is a different model entirely. Read comparisons between the two carefully before you buy. ALSO, this box came extremely dirty and taped over several times.... obviously it was returned and badly stored. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: G. Pope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for about a week now. It is bright and clear. When it was setting next to the old one, I couldn't believe the differance. I'm not use to the extra width of the unit, but I will get use to it. Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Knack

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, good amount of features but falls a little short
customer_reviews.text: After searching and reading so many reviews I finally gave the Asus PA238Q a chance since overall the reviews were mostly positive Pros: Accurate colors On screen features Connectivity Stand is great Cons Black light bleed Lacks contrast/brightness Text have that green tint when viewed on a white background No built in speakers Overall: Good screen but to me not worth the price. I returned the item just to purchase another VH238H which I found was better for the "average" user.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere near worth the money unless you are a professional photo enthusiast. The only the I will give an A+ on Is the adjustable display.
customer_reviews.author: Deezy

customer_reviews.title: great monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is great, especially in you are used to a tn panel. Vibrant beautiful colors and great response time. Unfortunately it was naught from a sub company and not amazon, so I had some poower issues and the company would not do an exchange, only a return and I would have to ship it to them out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Bman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with PA238Q
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 23 inch monitor with IPS and an LED backlight. The ASUS PA238Q got good reviews and had the best price in its class. All I had to do was plug it in and set the resolution to the max (1920 X 1080). The output is bright and beautiful using the analog input (I use the analog instead of the digital because I have an analog KVM switch for alternating between a Mac and a PC). The stand adjustment is really easy on every axis. My only negative comment is that the menu operation is not intuitive. It's kind of clunky but I don't use the menus often so this is not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: He Said She Said

product_meta.title: Asus PA238Q 23-Inch Professional Super-IPS Full-HD LED Monitor
product_meta.description:
The professional PA238Q with a Touch of Play. IPS panel with 100% sRGB coverage and 178 wide viewing angle. Every unit is factory-calibrated for superior color fidelity.

AMAZON.COM
 Design With Confidence

Create picture-perfect images with the fully-adjustable 23-inch ASUS PA238Q IPS LCD monitor. Featuring a 1920 x 1080 resolution IPS (Professional In-Plane Switching) LED-backlit panel, this monitor delivers 100% color reproduction in the sRGB color space. Along with a 16:9 widescreen aspect ratio and 178 degree viewing angles, experience accurate high definition picture from virtually any perspective. Built with an assortment of easily accessible USB ports, you can quickly transfer data to and from storage devices. The ASUS PA238Q is VESA-mountable and boasts 4-way ergonomic adjustments—pivot, height, swivel, and tilt adjustments quickly suit your specific needs. Connect via the DisplayPort 1.1a, HDMI 1.3, DVI, or D-sub and start designing your work of art with confidence. 


KEY FEATURES
 * 23-inch 1920 x 1080 IPS (In-Plane Switching) LED-backlit panel delivers consistent color depth at virtually any angle. (Learn more)
 * Expanded color gamut with 100% color reproduction of sRGB color space for precise color (Learn more)
 * ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio with 50,000,000:1 contrast ratio dynamically adjusts between black and white for sharper and brighter visuals 
 * VESA mountable design and 4-way ergonomic adjustments enable pivot, height, swivel, and tilt adjustments
 * 
 * Two USB 2.0 ports for quick image and data transfers between storage devices (Learn more)
 * QuickFit provides commonly-used layout formats directly on screen for more accurate sizing (Learn more)
 * 3 year system warranty, 3 year panel warranty, 3 year Zero Bright Dot guarantee, ASUS Rapid Replacement policy



LEARN MORE
DEFINITIVE IMAGE ACCURACY
View larger Featuring an IPS LED-backlit panel, the PA238Q monitor delivers 16.7 million colors with precise color accuracy and 100% sRGB color spaces reproduction for accurate CAD/CAM drafting, graphic design, and photo editing. And with 1920 x 1080 high resolution, as well as a 16:9 aspect ratio, and 178 degree height and vertical viewing ratio, experience extraordinary image quality from virtually any angle. Each PA238Q is color calibrated after it's built and includes the certificate of authenticity, saving you hundreds from having to purchase a separate calibrator. 


ERGONOMIC VERSATILITY

View larger Built from the ground up to suit your specific needs, the PA238Q monitor is VESA wall mountable and features easy tilt, height, pivot, and swivel adjustments. A measurement ruler edged around the display frame and base stand, ensures exact alignment to a tee. The monitor bezel is specially designed to be thinner for an enhanced multi-display setup. 


EASY ACCESSIBILITY 

View larger Along with ergonomics, the PA238Q provides easy access to your storage devices. It has two USB 2.0 ports on the side panel to quickly transfer data between storage devices. Hot keys—aligned across the bottom of the display's frame—instantly switches color modes, inputs, and enables the QuickFit function. QuickFit overlays 5 real world document formats and commonly-used size patterns directly on the screen to preview your work without printing. 


OPTIMUM CONNECTIVITY 

View larger The PA238Q includes DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI-D, D-sub, PC audio in, and a 1/8" audio-in jack, providing you with a wealth of connectivity to PCs, gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, and more. When connected to multiple devices, effortlessly switch between them using the front side input hotkey or place them side by side simultaneously using the Picture-in-Picture mode. 


ASUS WARRANTY 
The PA238Q comes with a 3 year global warranty as well as a 1 year Zero Bright Dot guarantee that ensures full replacement if there's so much as 1 bright dot pixel. Plus, ASUS Rapid Replacement provides fast and free replacement in no time at all.* 


WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * ASUS PA238Q IPS Monitor 
 * DVI Cable 
 * VGA Cable 
 * USB Cable
 * Power Cord & Adapter 
 * Quick Start Guide 
 * Color Calibration Certificate 
 * Warranty Information Card 

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Panel: IPS
 * Panel Size: 23-inch Widescreen (16:10 Aspect Ratio) 
 * True Resolution: 1920 x 1080
 * Color Saturation (NTSC): 102% 
 * Pixel Pitch: 0.265 mm 
 * Brightness(Max): 400 cd/m2 
 * Contrast Ratio (Max): 50,000:1 
 * Display Color: 16.7 million (10-bit)
 * Viewing Angle (CR>=10): 178°(H)/178°(V) 
 * Response Time: 6ms (Gray-to-Gray) 
 * Video Features: 
   Trace Free Technology 
   Color Rich Technology 
   Splendid Video Intelligence Technology 
   Splendid Video Preset Modes (6 modes) 
   Color Temperature (3 modes) 
   HDCP support 
   Picture-in-Picture 
 * Audio Features: N/A 
 * Convenient Hotkey: 
   SPLENDID Video Preset Mode Selection 
   Auto Adjustment 
   Brightness Adjustment 
   Contrast Adjustment 
   QuickFit 
   Volume Adjustment 
   Input Selection 
 * PC Video Input: Display Port 1.1a/ DVI/ D-Sub / HDMI 1.3 
 * PC Audio Input: 3.5 mm mini-jack (for HDMI only)
 * Analog Signal Frequency: 30 ~ 83kHz(H)/ 56 ~ 76 Hz(V) 
 * Digital Signal Frequency: 30 ~ 83KHz(H)/56 ~ 76 Hz(V) 
 * Power Consumption: Normal < 72 W; Standby < 2 W 
 * Chassis Colors: Black 
 * Tilt: +20°~ 5° 
 * Swivel: +60°~ -60° 
 * Pivot: 90° (clockwise) 
 * Height Adjustment: 100mm 
 * VESA Wall Mounting: 100mm x 100mm 
 * Card Reader: 7-in-1 Card Reader (MS/MS Pro/MS Duo/ SM/ xD/ SD/ MMC)
 * USB: 2 x USB 2.0 out, 1 x USB 2.0 in
 * Security: Kensington lock 
 * Phys. Dimension (W x H x D): 21.98 x 14.99 x 9.25 –inches 
 * Weight (estimated): 15.87 lbs 
 * Regulation Approval: Energy Star, TCO'03, UL/cUL, CB, CE, FCC, CCC, TUV-GS, TUV-ERGO, ISO9231-307, BSMI, Gost-R, C-Tick, VCCI, PSB, NOM, J-Moss, RoHS, Windows 7 WHQL

© 2011 ASUS Computer International. All Rights Reserved. ASUS is a registered trademark of ASUSTeK Computer. All specifications are subject to change without notice. Color and bundled software versions are subject to change without notice. Brand and product names mentioned are trademarks of their respective companies. Product may not be exactly as shown in photos. (*) ASUSTeK will provide warranty coverage without charge if the purchased product is proven defective and workmanship under normal use within the warranty period, from the date of purchase from ASUSTeK or its authorized reseller. This limited warranty applies only to the original consumer purchaser and is effective only within three years (for the standard warranty) and one year (for the Zero Bright Dot warranty) from date of purchase. ASUS Rapid Replacement covers 2-way free shipping for US and Canada regions only.
feature_bullets: IPS LED with 50,000,000:1 ASCR and 178° Wide Viewing Angle
100% sRGB. Low Delta E for enhanced color reproduction
Robust Connectivity with DisplayPort, HDMI, and USB Hub
Quick Fit Virtual Scale for easy scaling and alignment
